00047 extern UINT32     MemDebugCounter;

00055 
00056 // Creates and adds a video object to list
00057 #ifdef EXTREME_MEMORY_DEBUGGING
00058       //This is the most effective way to debug memory leaks.  Each memory leak will be recorded in a linked
00059       //list containing a string referring to the location in code the memory was allocated in addition to 
00060       //the number of occurrences.  The shutdown code will report all unhandled memory with exact location allocated.
00061       void DumpMemoryInfoIntoFile( UINT8 *filename, BOOLEAN fAppend );
00062       BOOLEAN _AddAndRecordMemAlloc( UINT32 size, UINT32 uiLineNum, UINT8 *pSourceFile );
00063       #define           MemAlloc( size )              MemAllocXDebug( (size), __FILE__, __LINE__, NULL )
00064       #define           MemFree( ptr )                      MemFreeXDebug( (ptr), __FILE__, __LINE__, NULL )
00065       #define           MemRealloc( ptr, size ) MemReallocXDebug( (ptr), (size), __FILE__, __LINE__, NULL )
00066       extern PTR        MemAllocXDebug( UINT32 size, const char *szCodeString, INT32 iLineNum, void *pSpecial );
00067       extern void       MemFreeXDebug( PTR ptr, const char *szCodeString, INT32 iLineNum, void *pSpecial );
00068       extern PTR        MemReallocXDebug( PTR ptr, UINT32 size, const char *szCodeString, INT32 iLineNum, void *pSpecial );
00069 #else
00070       #ifdef _DEBUG
00071             //This is another debug feature.  Not as sophistocated, but definately not the pig the extreme system is.
00072             //This system reports all memory allocations/deallocations in the debug output.
00073             #define           MemAlloc( size )              MemAllocReal( (size), __FILE__, __LINE__ )
00074             #define           MemFree( ptr )                      MemFreeReal( (ptr), __FILE__, __LINE__ )
00075             #define           MemRealloc( ptr, size ) MemReallocReal( (ptr), (size), __FILE__, __LINE__ )
00076             extern PTR        MemAllocReal( UINT32 size, const char *, INT32 );
00077             extern void       MemFreeReal( PTR ptr, const char *, INT32  );
00078             extern PTR        MemReallocReal( PTR ptr, UINT32 size, const char *, INT32 );
00079       #else
00080             //Release build verison
00081             #include <malloc.h>
00082             #define           MemAlloc( size )                    malloc( (size) )
00083             #define           MemFree( ptr )                            free( (ptr) )
00084             #define           MemRealloc( ptr, size ) realloc( (ptr), (size) )
00085       #endif
00086 #endif
